document.discussion_title: Rikers trains guards in prohibited eye gouges, elbow strikes
document.topic_text: 0 Comment City correction officers are being trained to subdue prisoners with eye gouges, elbow strikes to the head and other facial blows — moves that fly against an agreement with the feds, The Post has learned. Mayor de Blasio reached a pact with Manhattan US Attorney Preet Bharara last year that settled a federal lawsuit aimed…
